thread.title: CATHY
thread.title_full: American Patriot Getaways reviewed by CATHY

author: CATHY
title: CATHY
text: After the fires, when Gatlinburg and Pigeon Forge were in time of need for tourists and tourism to rebound, Patriot Getaways made our visit seamless. We did not miss a beat during our vacation. Patriot Getaways moved us to a different mtn. home that met our needs . Would definitely use them again.
